spec_data.Name: dspam-libs
spec_data.Description:
The DSPAM core processing engine, also known as libdspam, provides all
critical spam filtering functions.  The engine is embedded into other
DSPAM components (such as the agent) and is responsbile for the actual
filtering logic.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 02:10:46 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: The DSPAM library core processing engines
